message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170. I'm confident you won't find a better offer for this quality.
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
